lenders.name: FELC

lenders.occupational_info: We are a part of the Free Enterprise Leadership Challenge, a summer camp hosted in North Carolina each year.  During FELC, students work in small groups to create a product or service for other members of the camp.  At the end of the week students can choose to keep the money or help developing entrepreneurs through Kiva.org

lenders.loan_because: I am committed that Americans resurrect our image in the world. Doing things that are positive, generous and good.  Loaning with Kiva is just a small step in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: I help customers install and configure software that helps large organizations be more effective.

lenders.name: Polaris
lenders.occupation: Land Steward/ Visual Artist/ Dj/ Promoter/ Human

lenders.name: Beau
lenders.loan_because: We in the west consume a disproportionate amount of the world's resources. We need to start equalizing the balance. I travel a lot and have seen the enormous economic disparities between countries and want to do something real about it.
lenders.occupational_info: We investigate and expose Internet scams and other practices harmful to people.

lenders.name: Kay P
lenders.loan_because: it evens things up just a little bit.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I loan because sometimes we all need a little help from family, friends, and neighbors to make our dreams realities.  It is great to help people who want to help themselves because good citizens making contributions to their societies is what every town needs to be strong and healthy.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: it's the most creative way to give I've ever seen!

lenders.name: Zain
lenders.loan_because: as a former Peace Corps Volunteer in Uzbekistan, i've seen first-hand how a little loan or grant can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: through my travels and work, i create friends, bonds, and facilitate education. i write about my experiences and talk about my findings to people in the United States who may not understand people from other cultures or nations.

lenders.name: Derek

lenders.name: Snookey

lenders.occupational_info: I dispense medications to sick people in hope that they will get better, feel better or get to a better place

lenders.name: Ginger

lenders.occupational_info: I help companies making efficient use of infomation and technology to improve their business especially in the compliance area of the banking &  Insurance industry

lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people have a business like my dad and mom.
lenders.occupational_info: I walk my dog and go to school on my bus.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: We all need to share, and to help one another!

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I love to help everyone that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant at a local cosmetics company.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I serve the public with regard to their water supply

lenders.name: Osman Rashid
lenders.loan_because: Financial stability leads to a happier family, which leads to more education for their kids, which means a brighter future for the entire family, community and beyond. I prefer to help at the grass roots level to see a meaningful impact rather than abstract support. Entrepreneurs are a force that can help change the world and we should encourage them.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: people in developing areas need more than just aid, they need empowerment.

lenders.name: Gallagher
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we love to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just a family like many others across the world. We work hard to take care of and to love each other.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference. We need to whatever we can; whatever makes sense to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a creative writer

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to people who are less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of Product Managers looking after payroll software solutions.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit is quite possibly the most ingenious system to help impoverished people.

lenders.name: Ken_Dirschl
lenders.loan_because: I love being in a position to help and feel micro-credit loans are superior to financing charity organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: Researching and devoloping internet media solutions for small business.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others. Isn't that why we're all here?
lenders.occupational_info: I describe and analyze new books for entry into the library's online catalog.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I find this a wonderful way to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently taking a break from the working world and instead find myself traveling to experience different cultures.

lenders.name: Bo Sellitti
lenders.loan_because: Helping one person get a start up with a relatively small sum of money can do so much to improve his or her life, his or her family, and the local economy.  I loan because it is an easy way to do my part.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It's an obligation to help others achieve prosperity!
lenders.occupational_info: I help empower people financially.

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.loan_because: My sister got me into Keva and it feels good to help out others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a math student at the University.  I am putting myself through school, so I understand that everyone can use a little help.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I can (do even a little) therefore I should.
lenders.occupational_info:
1 -  Aerialist: performing high in the air on a trapeze or hanging fabrics.

lenders.name: Kirileigh
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I do scientific research spanning a variety of fields: clinical, analytical chemistry, environmental science, physical chemistry, and medical sciences.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to remember and be grateful for my relative plenty, and I want to help others lift themselves up.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students how to communicate with our 100-watt FM radio station.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to encourage people to be responsible and self sufficient and give them an opportunity I wish someone had given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and deliver computer software training and develop policies and procedures (written instructions) for processes for people to do their job more efficiently.

lenders.name: The Alaska Pack
lenders.loan_because: Our children are learning that one less toy means another person is one step closer to obtaining the means to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We try to make people well again so that they can be independent.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: a small way of lending a helping hand to less fortunate but resourceful people.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better more simple way to truly help and encourage global growth and stability. The lasting effect and the potential created from a Kiva loan is priceless. The best part - you can have the same $100 work over and over again for the cause.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give back to the people in some the countries I've been fortunate enough to travel to & hope to see in the future. Because they have given me so much in life experiences.
lenders.occupational_info: I work behind the camera. In the technical field. Basically, I watch TV all day, I just don't get to change the channel.

lenders.name: Marek
lenders.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs raise funds to start their business.

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because: we need to help others more.

lenders.name: Kylie
lenders.loan_because: even my small donation can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Product development that is focused on creating the best possible outcome for the client and the planet.

lenders.name: Passion
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Heaslip Family
lenders.loan_because: Becuase we are fortunate enough to be able.

lenders.name: jason
lenders.loan_because: I like to see other people "having a go" to better their lives.

lenders.name: Kaye, Mark, Matt & Ben
lenders.loan_because:
It is our social responsibility to help those with less in the world. This is a great way to help at a grass roots level. It is nice to see the faces of those that we are able to help in a small way.
We want our children to grow up and think of the whole planet as one home and one family.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I've long been interested in micro-finance and was excited to find I could actually participate in it! The idea appeals to me so much more than a donation as lending allows the same money to help again and again, while also preserving the recipients' dignity and self-respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a local farmers market and I build websites with Wordpress.

lenders.name: wiwik
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women need to be empowered to provide a better life for their family,children, and for themselves. I couldn't have started my business without help and I want to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in broadcasting media as gate keeper. this job help people in public service.n i want to have side job to sell thing in fashions, such as clothing.

lenders.name: Sachiko
lenders.loan_because: It is important for  people to have the choices.

lenders.name: TPK
lenders.loan_because: I am doing well in life and I want the rest of the world to do well too. I believe everyone should give and that is the way to solve the ills of today.

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: It is worth sharing some of my money with less privileged people. Also I like that they have ideas and an ambition and I feel giving them a loan rather than a donation is more respectful and trustful.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of Software Developers in a large worldwide IT company. I am located in Germany.

lenders.name: sabine
lenders.loan_because: we are all belonging together
lenders.occupational_info:
I design together with nice people from Czech republic textiles for 
seats in cars

lenders.loan_because: this is a straightforward way of increasing opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: provide financial products to big companies

lenders.name: jeff & tu
lenders.loan_because: i'd rather help someone who is committed to helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I put together medical programs that involve both western and complementary medicine.

lenders.name: The Wilsons
lenders.loan_because: In a small way we can help others.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who want to help themselves

lenders.name: Jesper
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepeneurs in developing countries create a better life for their families - and their fellow citizens
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business lawyer

lenders.name: Kary
lenders.loan_because: "Kindness in Giving creates Love "- Lao Tzu
lenders.occupational_info:
I create art .  
While this is my love ...  helping homeless dogs is  my passion.

lenders.name: Shvets
lenders.loan_because:
Hello! 
His business, I do not want to open yet. 
I am a normal girl with average wealth, so I need finance for the children.
But I do with children. We have many children in Ukraine who have no relatives. My dream-to help these children settle in life. 
I believe the girl. 
I need sponsors that have helped me to reorganize the children's home. I need your help.

lenders.name: Aine
lenders.loan_because: it's great to be able to support women and families trying to improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I look after and care for women and their families throughout pregnancy, childbirth and early parenthood

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: To give back and serve the lord.  It is something my mom and I can do together.

lenders.name: Graciela
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help others help themselves. Much better than giving money because when people achieve things for themselves, they feel proud, satisfied and more motivated to continue. They also acquire greater self-confidence.
lenders.occupational_info: I tutor students with their school English and French. Also teach English to adults who want to either learn the language from 0 or improve it.

lenders.name: Dorte
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a very good way to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer in Nepal. Helping the very poor to be able to take a loan later.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
Bill Clinton's book "Giving" spoke about Kiva and I knew immediately that I wanted to be involved with this. 

I like the proverb "Show a man and he'll teach no-one. Show a woman and she'll teach the village." Another proverb I like is "Money is like manure. You've got to spread it around to let small things grow."

The idea of being a like a small bank is such a wonderful idea! To be directly contributing to people growing their businesses in places that are tiny specks on a map is just an awesome concept!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a website developer in the government sector. My organisation serves an area with a population of over 100,000 people, providing services from children's health, youth services, aged care, health, events,  infrastructure and more.

The website I develop helps people learn about our activities and how we can help them in their lives.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is important to act on both the micro and macro levels. I lend to improve the situation for an individual/community AND I agitate with my government for an improvement based in their foreign affairs policies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am primarily a weaver of tapestry and cloth. I also make jewellry using a lacemaking technique.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I simply want to help others and provide them with opportunities, and doing it this way just feels right!

lenders.name: Quench Bath & Body
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to help people to help themselves.  Also, being a small business owner, I know how it can end up being a viscious cycle when you can't grow your business unless you have X, which you cannot get until you have the money to buy Y.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a bath and body products company that specializes in traditional beauty rituals from around the world.  We find these products, and then buy either the finished products or the ingredients needed from the country of origin, ideally from a coop, or a small busines owner in the country, and make the product available to consumers here in the US.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: My owners gave me a second chance and I believe it is important to pay it forward!

lenders.name: Katharine
lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: JAN
lenders.loan_because: It can change people's  lives and fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Design & photography

lenders.name: Poverty2Prosperity
lenders.loan_because: http://Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) engages in poverty alleviating projects. One major project is to provide microloans through the Kiva platform. You can help support P2P by joining our lending team here: http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity
lenders.occupational_info: One of P2P's major poverty alleviating projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because:
I was lucky in my life... it wasn't hard to get money i have, so i can give them to someone.
Second reason is that i love people trying to do business with few money.
lenders.occupational_info: I started building websites... now i have some websites that give me revenue

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I'm riding round the world on an old motorcycle and I enjoy helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have much money myself and I enjoy people pulling themselves up by their bootstraps.

lenders.name: rick
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help other single mothers achieve their dreams

lenders.name: anjachristina
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money for me can make a little difference in the life of someone else. If I can help someone start a business or earn a living better with this loan, I´m happy to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am working in the engine development of a german car manufacturer.
